mapper.select: SELECT D.SERVICE_GROUP_NAME AS SERVICE_GROUP, D.NAME AS API, TIMESTAMP::DATE AS DATE, SUM(1) AS COUNT FROM API_LOG A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.ID, B.NAME, B.FLOW_ID, C.ID AS SERVICE_GROUP_ID, C.NAME AS SERVICE_GROUP_NAME FROM API_INFO B LEFT OUTER JOIN SERVICE_GROUP C ON B.SERVICE_GROUP_ID = C.ID ) D ON A.FLOW_ID = D.FLOW_ID GROUP BY SERVICE_GROUP, API, TIMESTAMP::DATE
SELECT B.NAME AS SERVICE_GROUP, A.NAME AS API FROM API_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN SERVICE_GROUP B ON A.SERVICE_GROUP_ID = B.ID
